title: Aggregating midpoint-indicator results from Environmental Product Declarations for comprehensive evaluations of products' profiles, through the Dominance-based Rough Set Approach: An application in the Durum-Wheat Pasta Sector
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Environmental Impact Assessment Review, Volume 106

Author(s): Carlo Ingrao, Agata Matarazzo, Giovanni Lagioia, Roman Słowiński
